html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-01482024-02-19PS, CRA
ActBudget Implementation Act, 2022, No. 1
SubjectOrder Fixing the Day on Which this Order is Made as the Day on Which Certain Provisions of the Budget Implementation Act, 2022, No. 1 Come into Force
PrecisOrder fixing the day on which this Order is made as the day on which sections 302, 304 to 306, and 308 to 328 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2022, NO. 1, chapter 10 of the Statutes of Canada, 2022, COME INTO FORCE in order to bring into force the amendments in the Customs Act which allow for the electronic administration and enforcement of the Act, clarify the authorities of the Minister and the Governor in Council, and ensure consistency in the language between English and French texts.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order fixing the day on which this Order is made as the day on which sections 302, 304 to 306, and 308 to 328 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2022, NO. 1, chapter 10 of the Statutes of Canada, 2022, COME INTO FORCE in order to bring into force the amendments in the Customs Act which allow for the electronic administration and enforcement of the Act, clarify the authorities of the Minister and the Governor in Council, and ensure consistency in the language between English and French texts.
